verses.verse: Woe <S%H480><s%> is <S%H625>me<s%>! for I am as when they have gathered the summer <S%H7019>fruits<s%>, as the grape <S%H5955>gleanings<s%> of the <S%H1210>vintage<s%>: there is no <S%H811>cluster<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%>; my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H183>desireth<s%> the <S%H1063>first-ripe<s%> fig.

The <S%H2623>godly<s%> man is <S%H6>perished<s%> out of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and there is none <S%H3477>upright<s%> among <S%H120>men<s%>: they all lie in <S%H693>wait<s%> for <S%H1818>blood<s%>; they <S%H6679>hunt<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H251>brother<s%> with a <S%H2764>net<s%>.

Their <S%H3709>hands<s%> are upon that which is <S%H7451>evil<s%> to do it <S%H3190>diligently<s%>; the <S%H8269>prince<s%> <S%H7592>asketh<s%>, and the <S%H8199>judge<s%> is ready for a <S%H7966>reward<s%>; and the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1696>man<s%>, he uttereth the <S%H1942>evil<s%> <S%H5315>desire<s%> of his <S%H5686>soul<s%>: thus they weave it together.

The <S%H2896>best<s%> of them is as a <S%H2312>brier<s%>; the most <S%H3477>upright<s%> is worse than a thorn <S%H4534>hedge<s%>: the <S%H3117>day<s%> of thy <S%H6822>watchmen<s%>, even thy <S%H6486>visitation<s%>, is <S%H935>come<s%>; now shall be their <S%H3998>perplexity<s%>.

Trust <S%H539><s%> ye not in a <S%H7453>neighbor<s%>; put ye not <S%H982>confidence<s%> in a <S%H441>friend<s%>; <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H6607>doors<s%> of thy <S%H6310>mouth<s%> from her that <S%H7901>lieth<s%> in thy <S%H2436>bosom<s%>.

For the <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H5034>dishonoreth<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%>, the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> riseth <S%H6965>up<s%> against her <S%H517>mother<s%>, the <S%H2545>daughter-in<s%>-law against her <S%H3618>mother-in<s%>-law; a <S%H376>man<s%>'s <S%H341>enemies<s%> are the <S%H582>men<s%> of his own <S%H1004>house<s%>.
But as for <S%H6822>me<s%>, I will look unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; I will <S%H3176>wait<s%> for the <S%H430>God<s%> of my <S%H3468>salvation<s%>: my <S%H430>God<s%> will hear <S%H8085>me<s%>.

Rejoice <S%H8055><s%> not against <S%H341>me<s%>, O mine enemy: when I <S%H5307>fall<s%>, I shall <S%H6965>arise<s%>; when I <S%H3427>sit<s%> in <S%H2822>darkness<s%>, <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> will be a light unto <S%H216>me<s%>.

I will <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H2197>indignation<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, because I have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against <S%H7378>him<s%>, until he plead my <S%H7379>cause<s%>, and <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%> for <S%H3318>me<s%>: he will bring me forth to the <S%H216>light<s%>, and I shall <S%H7200>behold<s%> his <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>.

Then mine <S%H341>enemy<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H955>it<s%>, and shame shall <S%H3680>cover<s%> her who <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3068>me<s%>, Where is Jehovah thy <S%H430>God<s%>? Mine <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> my desire upon <S%H4823>her<s%>; now shall she be trodden down as the <S%H2916>mire<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets<s%>.
A <S%H3117>day<s%> for <S%H1129>building<s%> thy <S%H1447>walls<s%>! in that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H2706>decree<s%> be far <S%H7368>removed<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall they <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee from <S%H804>Assyria<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4693>Egypt<s%>, and from <S%H4693>Egypt<s%> even to the <S%H5104>River<s%>, and from <S%H3220>sea<s%> to <S%H3220>sea<s%>, and from <S%H2022>mountain<s%> to <S%H2022>mountain<s%>.
Yet shall the <S%H776>land<s%> be <S%H8077>desolate<s%> because of them that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H6529>therein<s%>, for the fruit of their <S%H4611>doings<s%>.

Feed <S%H7462><s%> thy <S%H5971>people<s%> with thy <S%H7626>rod<s%>, the <S%H6629>flock<s%> of thy <S%H5159>heritage<s%>, which <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H910>solitarily<s%>, in the <S%H3293>forest<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of <S%H3760>Carmel<s%>: let them <S%H7462>feed<s%> in <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> and <S%H1568>Gilead<s%>, as in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5769>old<s%>.
As in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H3318>coming<s%> forth out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> will I <S%H7200>show<s%> unto them marvellous <S%H6381>things<s%>.

The <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H7200>see<s%> and be <S%H954>ashamed<s%> of all their <S%H1369>might<s%>; they shall <S%H7760>lay<s%> their <S%H3027>hand<s%> upon their <S%H6310>mouth<s%>; their <S%H241>ears<s%> shall be <S%H2790>deaf<s%>.

They shall <S%H3897>lick<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> like a <S%H5175>serpent<s%>; like crawling <S%H2119>things<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> they shall come <S%H7264>trembling<s%> out of their close <S%H4526>places<s%>; they shall come with <S%H3372>fear<s%> unto <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%>, and shall be afraid because of <S%H3372>thee<s%>.

Who is a <S%H410>God<s%> like unto <S%H5375>thee<s%>, that pardoneth <S%H5771>iniquity<s%>, and passeth <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H6588>transgression<s%> of the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of his <S%H5159>heritage<s%>? he <S%H2388>retaineth<s%> not his <S%H639>anger<s%> for <S%H5703>ever<s%>, because he <S%H2654>delighteth<s%> in <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%>.

He will <S%H7725>again<s%> have <S%H7355>compassion<s%> upon <S%H3533>us<s%>; he will tread our <S%H5771>iniquities<s%> under <S%H7993>foot<s%>; and thou wilt cast all their <S%H2403>sins<s%> into the <S%H4688>depths<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>.

Thou wilt <S%H5414>perform<s%> the <S%H571>truth<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, and the <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> to <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, which thou hast <S%H7650>sworn<s%> unto our <S%H1>fathers<s%> from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%>.
